SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ChatConstants
A utility class that holds constant values used throughout the chat application.
Client
The Client class handles the client-side functionality for a chat application.
ClientConnection
Represents a connection to a client on the server side.
ClientHandler
Handles the server-side processing for a single client connection.
MessageReceiver
The MessageReceiver class is responsible for receiving messages from the server and displaying them to the client.
MessageSender
The MessageSender class is responsible for sending messages from the client to the server.
Server
The Server class initializes and manages a chat server.
ShutdownThread
A thread that listens for a shutdown command from the server administrator.
UserInputHandler
The UserInputHandler class is responsible for interacting with the user to gather necessary input such as the user's name and the server's address.
